item.title: Thông điệp dành cho những người hữu duyên
item.description: THÔNG ĐIỆP TỪ CÕI VÔ HÌNH Messages from the Invisible World Medicine for your soul You will encounter an event in your life…it is very hard to swallow. It will taste like medicine; bitter. But after you swallow your medicine, learn your lesson from this experience, it will be like a cure for your illness. Swallow the lesson and you will be cure. Những thử thách trong cuộc sống đôi khi rất khó nuốt trôi.
